resources.string:
v2.2.05-24
 Location Fixes:
 Morgan County, AL
 
 General Fixes:
 Recently introduced problem with calls not opening until Cadpage is restarted.
 
 v2.2.05-23
 New Locations:
 Gem County, ID
 
 Location Fixes:
 Warren County, MS
 Pasquotank County, NC
 Allen County, OH
 Ellis County, TX
 Wythe County, VA
 
 General Fixes:
 CodeMessaging users should be allowed to set up a Cadpage Service subscription without a paid subscription.
 Problem setting up location permissions for Active911 under Android 11.

 General Fixes:
 Modified the audio notification override feature to make it easier to switch back and forth between standard and override notifications.
